short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: hrConnectum Plugin to connect recruiting platforms with the tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: hrConnectum Plugin to connect recruiting platforms with the tool. Recruiters using this plugin will be able to automatically import required information from recruitment platforms into the hrConnectum Tool.
